protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12332
text: See Leibfried, A., To, J. P., Busch, W., Stehling, S., Kehle, A., Demar, M., Kieber, J. J. and Lohmann, J. U. (2005). WUSCHEL controls meristem function by direct regulation of cytokinin-inducible response regulators. Nature 438, 1172-5.

protocol.name: E.coli Scan
text: Arrays were scanned with Packard BioChip ScanArray 5000 (PerkinElmer, USA) at a resolution of 10 µm per pixel.
(Parameters: Scanning hardware = ScanArray 5000 [PerkinElmer], Scanning software = ScanArray Express [PerkinElmer])

protocol.name: E. coli Transf
protocol.text: Data from spots with a diameter inferior to 200 µm and with signal intensity lower than twice the background were removed. Three independent microarray experiments were performed.
